passives.name: Anguish
passives.effects: Every 4 seconds after entering combat with champions, sap all enemy champions around you within 650 units to deal {{as|magic damage}} equal to {{as|3% of your '''bonus''' health}} to them and {{tip|heal}} yourself equal to 250% of the {{tt|post-mitigation|Damage calculated after modifiers}} damage dealt.

effects_structured.raw: Every 4 seconds after entering combat with champions, sap all enemy champions around you within 650 units to deal {{as magic damage}} equal to {{as 3% of your '''bonus''' health}} to them and {{tip heal}} yourself equal to 250% of the {{tt post-mitigation Damage calculated after modifiers}} damage dealt.
